name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tupik- GPT to read you faster
name.fr,hi,id,it,ko,pl,pt_BR,pt_PT,ru,ta,tr,z: Tupik - AI Language Assistant For Kindle

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat GPT powered pharaphrasing for Kindle reader. Makes it super easy to read.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Introducing Tupik, the ultimate Kindle Text Simplifier Chrome extension that transforms your digital reading experience. With Tupik, you can effortlessly convert complicated words and phrases into more digestible language, making Kindle books enjoyable and accessible for everyone, particularly for those who find complex text challenging or are non-native English speakers.

Key Features:

Simplify: Tupik intelligently restructures complex sentences and phrases into simpler, more approachable language, making it easier for you to understand and appreciate the content.
Transform: With just a few clicks, Tupik revolutionizes your Kindle reading experience by making even the most difficult text clear and easy to read.
Comprehend: Enhance your reading comprehension and enjoy the content you're reading without the frustration of deciphering complex text.

Why Choose Tupik?

Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone seeking to improve their reading comprehension and overall experience with Kindle books.
Ideal for those encountering language barriers or learning difficulties.
Save time when dealing with dense material or technical terminology.
Continuously updated with the latest natural language processing technology, ensuring the restructured text remains accurate and relevant while preserving the original meaning of the content.

Tupik is dedicated to making reading more accessible and enjoyable for everyone. With this Chrome extension, you can transform your Kindle reading experience and boost your comprehension effortlessly. Install Tupik today and embark on a new journey of easy-to-understand Kindle books.

How to Install and Use Tupik:

Click "Add to Chrome" to install Tupik on your browser.
Sign in to your Amazon Kindle account and open a Kindle book.
Activate Tupik by clicking on the extension icon in your Chrome toolbar.
Select the text you want to simplify, and let Tupik work its magic.
Privacy & Permissions:
Tupik requires permission to read and modify content on Amazon Kindle pages to provide its text simplification functionality. We value your privacy and do not store, share, or sell any of your personal data.

Support & Feedback:
We're committed to continuous improvement and value your feedback. If you encounter any issues or have suggestions, please contact us at bansal.rahul14@gmail.com, and we'll be happy to assist you.

Start enhancing your Kindle reading experience today with Tupik, the Kindle Text Simplifier Chrome extension. Add Tupik to your Chrome browser now and unlock a world of easy-to-understand Kindle books!
long.ca,de,es,fr,hi,id,it,ko,pl,pt_BR,pt_PT,r: Tupik is your AI-powered language assistant that simplifies complex sentences and helps you recall previous chapter summaries quickly. With the power of OpenAI's chat GPT technology, Tupik can provide you with clear and concise explanations of even the hardest texts. Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone who wants to better understand what they're reading. Get started now and experience the power of AI-driven language assistance with Tupik!
